entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
